name: Lunatone
author: Naoyo Kimura
flavor_text: Because it turns active on nights of the full moon, it is said to have some link to the lunar phases.

poke_body.name: Marvel Eyes
poke_body.effect: If you have Solrock in play, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to any of your Lunatone or Solrock by your opponent’s Pokémon LV.X.

attacks.name: Gravity Wave
attacks.effect: Does 30 damage to each of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon that doesn’t have a Retreat Cost. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
